Contact Us

Questions?

Questions about the zXc service can be sent to:
sales@zxc.solutions

Problems with your service?

To report problems with your existing zXc service:
noc@zxc.solutions
1-888-915-5510

Questions about your invoice?

Questions about your zXc invoice can be sent to:
finance@zxc.solutions

You can also visit ZenFi and Cross River Fiber websites for more information.
